definition: can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])

sentences.english: This will be the first report for WHO of this nature ever commissioned by Member States.
sentences.chinese: 这将是会员国委托的第一份此类性质的世卫组织报告。

sentences.english: Note that Member States can submit new resolutions for WHA consideration.
sentences.chinese: 注意各会员国可提交新的决议供卫生大会审议。

sentences.english: Ultimately its decisions would have binding powers over EU member states.
sentences.chinese: 其决定最终将对各欧盟会员国具有约束效力。

sentences.english: Second, I will not tolerate abuse of our relationship with Member States.
sentences.chinese: 其次，我不能容忍滥用我们与会员国的关系。

sentences.english: UN welcomes South Sudan as its 193rd member.
sentences.chinese: 南苏丹成为联合国第193个会员国。

sentences.english: The process of reform is Member State-driven and inclusive.
sentences.chinese: 改革进程由会员国推动并具有包容性。

sentences.english: Now the alert for his detainment has spread across all Interpol member states.
sentences.chinese: 现在逮捕他的警报已经遍及所有国际刑警组织会员国。

sentences.english: Inter-member country use of SDR's may be by agreement or by designation.
sentences.chinese: 会员国之间使用特别提款权可采用协议或指定的办法。

sentences.english: These reflect WHO's medium-term strategy for cooperation with Member States.
sentences.chinese: 这些战略反应世卫组织与会员国合作的中期战略。

sentences.english: The European Union's presidency rotates between member countries.
sentences.chinese: 欧牛耳委由各会员国轮流担任。

sentences.english: Navi Pillay, the U. N. High Commissioner for Human Rights, called for a renewed commitment by member states.
sentences.chinese: 联合国人权高级专员皮莱，呼吁会员国重申这些承诺。

sentences.english: The UN family has 191 members. Unity is the source of strength.
sentences.chinese: 联合国是191个会员国的大家庭，团结是力量所在。

sentences.english: All reform programs should be discussed democratically by the entire membership with a view to reaching a general consensus.
sentences.chinese: 改革方案应由全体会员国民主协商，达成广泛一致。

sentences.english: China is a founding member of the United Nations.
sentences.chinese: 中国是联合国的创始会员国之一。

sentences.english: WHO is committed to assisting its member states with that task.
sentences.chinese: 世卫组织将致力于协助其会员国开展这项工作。

definition: signatory states/countries that are party to a treaty
party in a contract, treaty etc

pinyin: Lian2 he2 guo2 An1 quan2 Li3 shi4 hui4

definition: G8 (group of eight major industrialized nations)
permanent member state (of UN Security Council)
Treaty on the Non-Proliferation of Nuclear Weapons
pinyin: Bu4 Kuo4 san4 He2 wu3 qi4 Tiao2 yue1
Shi4 jie4 Mao4 yi4 Zu3 zhi1

definition: abbr. for 歐洲共同體|欧洲共同体, European Community (old term for the EU, European Union)
